attributes.action: HALT UKBA FROM DEPORTING PARENTS OF MINOR
attributes.additional_details:
UKBA is still deporting parents of minors from UK while such children are left at the masses of the tax payers, some parents have been deported for illegal working and illegal entry just for the other parent with the chidren left in UK to remarry and keep living on allowance
UKBA should be encouraged to ensure all immigrants parents look for job and care for their children instead of deporting them
